name: Bloody Hallowfest
description:
Bloody Hallowfest is a horror game with a retro visual style, inspired by some classic B-series horror films from the 90s.


On the night before Halloween, Maya and her friends gather at the summer camp, eager to set up a special event for the youngsters. Together, they deck out the place and prepare games for Halloween night (kids love hunting for pumpkins and taking a swing at the pinata filled with sweets and candies!). What starts as a fun night takes a horrifying turn when a stranger, wielding a bloodied axe, barges in and snuffs out everyone's lives.

Now, Maya is forced to run for her life. As she unravels the escape plan, she also delves into a sinister secret behind the killer and the motives that led to such a massacre. Will Maya manage to escape the nightmare and confront the truth, or perhaps her blood will mingle with that of her friends on the cold steel of the killer's axe?


  • Survive the Night: Help Maya navigate through the terrors of the night and escape the bloodbath.
  • Unravel the Mystery: Uncover the sinister secret behind the killer and the motives that led to such a massacre.
  • Prepare for Halloween: Immerse yourself in the Halloween spirit by helping set up decorations and games for the night.
  • Retro Graphics: Experience the nostalgia of classic B-series horror films with the game's retro visual style.
